Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Logrono, Hotel Zenit Logroño is convenient to San Bartolome Church and Concatedral Santa Maria de La Redonda. This hotel is within close proximity of Santiago el Real and Museo de la Rioja.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 56 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include desks and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services. Additional features include a fireplace in the lobby and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Logrono? This hotel features 4304 square feet (400 square meters) of event facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Logrono, Hotel Zenit Logroño is convenient to San Bartolome Church and Concatedral Santa Maria de La Redonda. This hotel is within close proximity of Santiago el Real and Museo de la Rioja.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

San Bartolome Church - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Concatedral Santa Maria de La Redonda - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Santiago el Real - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Museo de la Rioja - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Bodega Darien - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Bodega Vina Real - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Finca Valpiedra - 16 km / 9.9 mi
Bodegas Marques de Riscal - 17 km / 10.5 mi
Sojuela Golf Club - 17 km / 10.6 mi
Bodegas Ysios - 17.8 km / 11.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Logrono (RJL-Agoncillo) - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Vitoria (VIT) - 52.4 km / 32.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Zenit Logroño is Vitoria (VIT).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Zenit Logrono is Vitoria (VIT) - 52.4 km / 32.6 mi.
